name: Dual View! Lufthansa Airbus A330-343 [D-AIKN] Sunset Landing at Montréal-Trudeau ᴴᴰ
description:
Lufthansa flights are always a special experience, and this one was no different! Their service is fantastic, giving every Economy passenger hot towels before a meal service, friendly flight attendants, and a great selection on their built-in IFE. This flight was no exception. Enjoy this comprehensive arrival video into Montréal-Trudeau from Munich, including a clip of the final approach and landing from the outside! Special thank you to my good friend CYUL Plane Spotter for videoing that! Go check out his channel here: https://www.youtube.com/CYULPlaneSpotter

Thanks for watching!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

VIDEO LOG:
00:12 - Descending into Montreal over the Quebec countryside.
09:00 - Speedbrakes deployed.
13:00 - Lining up for runway 24R.
14:20 - Flaps extending.
14:45 - Gear down!
15:40 - Flaps extended fully.
17:10 - Dual view begins (video courtesy of CYUL Plane Spotter)
17:40 - Touchdown!
18:30 - Vacating 24R as flaps and spoilers retract.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Lufthansa (DLH/LH)
Aircraft: Airbus A330-300 (A333)
Aircraft Name: None
Livery: Standard
Engines: 2x RR Trent 772B-60
Registration: D-AIKN
Route: MUC-YUL
Callsign: Lufthansa 474 heavy
Runway used: 24R
Local Time: 1830
Seat: 26K
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/DAIKN
